entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
